sentences.en: A young man plunged from a sheer rock face to his death.
sentences.cn: 一名男青年从陡峭的岩壁上坠崖身亡。

sentences.en: cliffs which rose sheer from the sea
sentences.cn: 从海面垂直拔起的悬崖

sentences.en: I’ll never forget the look of sheer joy on her face.
sentences.cn: 我永远也不会忘记她满脸喜悦的神情。

sentences.en: Jack walked around the hotel and was mesmerized by its sheer size.
sentences.cn: 杰克在宾馆里四处转了转，为其宏伟气势所倾倒。

sentences.en: Men who use steroids are motivated by sheer vanity.
sentences.cn: 使用类固醇的男人纯粹是受虚荣心的驱使。

sentences.en: Most of my accomplishments came as the result of sheer doggedness.
sentences.cn: 我大多数的成就纯粹是坚持不懈的结果。

sentences.en: My face went crimson (which it does out of sheer funk).
sentences.cn: 我的脸变得通红（我极度恐慌时就会如此）。

sentences.en: sheer hypocrisy
sentences.cn: 十足的虚伪

sentences.en: sheer stockings
sentences.cn: 透明的女式长筒袜

sentences.en: Some shoppers looked bewildered by the sheer variety of goods on offer.
sentences.cn: 光是摆在那里的各式商品就让一些购物者晕头转向了。

sentences.en: Talent, hard work and sheer tenacity are all crucial to career success.
sentences.cn: 事业要成功，才能、勤奋和顽强的意志都至关重要。

sentences.en: The concert was sheer delight.
sentences.cn: 这场音乐会是一次十足的享受。

sentences.en: The hills rise green and sheer above the broad river.
sentences.cn: 这些小山碧绿陡峭，矗立在这条宽阔的河流之上。

sentences.en: The man and his son Mark had abseiled down the sheer cliffs.
sentences.cn: 这个男人和他的儿子马克曾沿绳索爬下过这些陡峭的悬崖。

sentences.en: The sheer number of spectators has caught everyone unprepared.
sentences.cn: 观众的人数之多让所有人措手不及。

sentences.en: The sheer physical effort had exacted a heavy price.
sentences.cn: 纯粹的体力劳动已经产生了极其不利的影响。

sentences.en: The sheer quantity of detail would bemuse even the most clear-headed author.
sentences.cn: 光是这么多的细节就会让哪怕是头脑最清醒的作者感到困惑。

sentences.en: There was a sheer drop just outside my window.
sentences.cn: 就在我的窗外有一个陡坡。

sentences.en: This is sheer bloody-mindedness.
sentences.cn: 这纯粹是故意刁难。

sentences.en: Through sheer force of personality Hugh Trenchard had got his way.
sentences.cn: 休·特伦查德完全凭着个人魅力就能随心所欲。

sentences.en: You may feel dwarfed by the sheer scale of the place.
sentences.cn: 看到此处气势如此恢宏，你可能会觉得自己很渺小。
